course_description: In this course, students develop a theological framework for understanding the ecological dimensions of Christian life and vocation, and examine educational practices and theories that contribute to the formation of an ecological faith.
schedule_location: W 9am-11am in Rita Anne Rollins Building_549
sections: Class Nbr: 5120, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 9-11a, Instructor: J. Ayres, Status: Open
